name: Wizen Token
description: WZN is a competitive four-player card game where players must skillfully balance luck, memory, and tactical decision-making to outplay their opponents. Each session blends dynamic hands, strategic bidding, and fast mental adaptation in a battle for supremacy. Players can climb seasonal rankings and qualify for the legendary WZN World Championship, held once a year to crown the ultimate master. Loyalty, precision, and courage will determine who rises to the top.
